channel.title: Project Pearl Updated V1 !~Readed 10000+ times 6k Downloads ~!
channel.description:
Hello guys maybe some of you know that i ran Projectpearl for while but i cant make it 24/7 so i released it :D Enjoy Looking!! :P
Base is Ddssspeced Source Credits. JaydenD12 Delta Moparscape Tut's For me Editing Dont Flame Please This My first Server So Enjoy;) -Added So Npc's Talk -More xp For hits so u lvl up fast -More Npc's Added like Steel Drags ,Bronze Drags,Iron Drags,Black Dragons Blue Dragons And more -Added More Portal's -Stalls Are at Home -Hero Guild Need lvl 126 to enter -Special Place To Change Your Magic -Most Shops Are At Catherby -Thief Area -And more.... :cool: New Update Got!:
New Godwars Npc's You need now 10 kils to enter! [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/23hkcig.jpg[/img] New Npc With Torso Mini U get 2 Points From him! [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/b9dmie.jpg[/img] Updated Download Links:
http://rapidshare.com/files/179339201/ProjectPearl_v1_Updated.rar.html http://files.filefront.com/ProjectPearl+v1+Updated http://uppit.com/TVS5NW http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Y0PIWE4T http://www.MegaShare.com/561772 Megashare Doesnt Got Wait Limit For a While..
How Many Accounts Were Made On My Server :( [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ypkzuc.jpg[/img]
Here Are Some Photos: Some Shops Are At Home And At Catherby [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2samnae.jpg[/img] Magic Is working for 90% Thanks to Maker of Ddssspeced [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/dxg5e9.jpg[/img] Commands For People How Dont Want ::pure They Want Pure mage or Pure range Etc. So Commands : ::puremage ::purerange ::purestr [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/6t1zwz.jpg[/img] Npc Talk + 100% Crafting [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/1j1qq.jpg[/img] Added A Lot of Npc's! Like: Black Drag's ,blue's,steel etc. [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/v6u4w8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/v46w4h.jpg[/img] God Sword Spec's Works And Veng + U keep 3 items on dead [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/68ae6o.jpg[/img] I edited Void So u Hit Alot more [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2m7j9g1.jpg[/img] And MiniGames [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/18c5rc.jpg[/img]
New Client Link's Enjoy Client 1: Got Rs HP bar But is Smaller Fille (18.11 MB) Size<Extract in 6 sec's http://rapidshare.com/files/179182743/Project_Pearl_NEW_HP_BAR.rar.html http://files.filefront.com/Project+Pearl+NEW+HP+BARrar/;12855902;/fileinfo.html [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2h4z2ox.jpg[/img]
Client 2: Self Made HP Bar Bigger Fille (19.16 MB) Size<Extract in 6 sec's Download Link is coming because a mistake! [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2u3vaxt.jpg[/img]
